item.title: Computer Vision Engineer
item.description:
About Me

As a Computer Vision Engineer, I harness advanced deep learning and image‚Äêprocessing techniques to build AI-powered visual inspection systems that drive manufacturing quality and efficiency. My work bridges cutting-edge research with the rugged demands of the factory floor, delivering robust, deployable solutions that deliver clear ROI.

Core Competencies

  • Surface Anomaly Detection
    Leverage convolutional neural networks and unsupervised learning to identify defects on complex textures in real time.

  • Real-Time Conveyor-Belt Inspection
    Design and deploy low-latency vision pipelines for high-speed production lines, ensuring zero downtime and maximal throughput.
